1: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>unto Moses</n> וְאֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> אַהֲרֹ֖ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>and unto Aaron</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n>
2: אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>Every man</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>his own</n> דִּגְל֤וֹ <sup>1714 </sup> <n>by his own standard</n> בְאֹתֹת֙ <sup>226 </sup> <n>with the ensign</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אֲבֹתָ֔ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their father's</n> יַחֲנ֖וּ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>shall pitch</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מִנֶּ֕גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>far off</n> סָבִ֥יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>about</n> לְאֹֽהֶל־ <sup>168 </sup> <n>the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֖ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>shall they pitch</n>
3: וְהַחֹנִים֙ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>pitch</n> קֵ֣דְמָה <sup>6924 </sup> <n>And on the east side</n> מִזְרָ֔חָה <sup>4217 </sup> <n>toward the rising</n> דֶּ֛גֶל <sup>1714 </sup> <n>of the sun shall they of the standard</n> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the camp</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>throughout their armies</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>[shall be] captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <sup>5177 </sup> <n>and Nahshon</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <sup>5992 </sup> <n>of Amminadab</n>
4: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>four</n> וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <sup>7657 </sup> <n>seventy</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>and six</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n>
5: וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <sup>2583 </sup> <n>And those that do pitch</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>next</n> מַטֵּ֣ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>next unto him [shall be] the tribe</n> יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <sup>3485 </sup> <n>of Issachar</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>[shall be] captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <sup>3485 </sup> <n>of Issachar</n> נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <sup>5417 </sup> <n>and Nethaneel</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> צוּעָֽר׃ <sup>6686 </sup> <n>of Zuar</n>
6: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>and four</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>thereof [were] fifty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>and four</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> ס
7: מַטֵּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>[Then] the tribe</n> זְבוּלֻ֑ן <sup>2074 </sup> <n>of Zebulun</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>[shall be] captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> זְבוּלֻ֔ן <sup>2074 </sup> <n>of Zebulun</n> אֱלִיאָ֖ב <sup>446 </sup> <n>and Eliab</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> חֵלֹֽן׃ <sup>2497 </sup> <n>of Helon</n>
8: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> שִׁבְעָ֧ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>and seven</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>thereof [were] fifty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>and four</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n>
9: כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>that</n> הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <sup>6485 </sup> <n>All that were numbered</n> לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>in the camp</n> יְהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> מְאַ֨ת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>[were] an hundred</n> אֶ֜לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <sup>8084 </sup> <n>and fourscore</n> אֶ֛לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְשֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>and six</n> אֲלָפִ֥ים <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְאַרְבַּע־ <sup>702 </sup> <n>and four</n> מֵא֖וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>throughout their armies</n> רִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>These shall first</n> יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>set forth</n> ס
10: דֶּ֣גֶל <sup>1714 </sup> <n>[shall be] the standard</n> מַחֲנֵ֧ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the camp</n> רְאוּבֵ֛ן <sup>7205 </sup> <n>of Reuben</n> תֵּימָ֖נָה <sup>8486 </sup> <n>On the south side</n> לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>according to their armies</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> רְאוּבֵ֔ן <sup>7205 </sup> <n>of Reuben</n> אֱלִיצ֖וּר <sup>468 </sup> <n>[shall be] Elizur</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <sup>7707 </sup> <n>of Shedeur</n>
11: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <sup>8337 </sup> <n>and six</n> וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>thereof [were] forty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>and five</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n>
12: וְהַחוֹנִ֥ם <sup>2583 </sup> <n>And those which pitch</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>next</n> מַטֵּ֣ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>by him [shall be] the tribe</n> שִׁמְע֑וֹן <sup>8095 </sup> <n>of Simeon</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> שִׁמְע֔וֹן <sup>8095 </sup> <n>of Simeon</n> שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <sup>8017 </sup> <n>[shall be] Shelumiel</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> צוּרִֽי־ שַׁדָּֽי׃ <sup>6701 </sup> <n>of Zurishaddai</n>
13: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <sup>8672 </sup> <n>and nine</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>of them [were] fifty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>and three</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n>
14: וְמַטֵּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>Then the tribe</n> גָּ֑ד <sup>1410 </sup> <n>of Gad</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> גָ֔ד <sup>1410 </sup> <n>of Gad</n> אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <sup>460 </sup> <n>[shall be] Eliasaph</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <sup>7467 </sup> <n>of Reuel</n>
15: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <sup>2568 </sup> <n>and five</n> וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <sup>705 </sup> <n>of them [were] forty</n> אֶ֔לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>and six</n> מֵא֖וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <sup>2572 </sup> <n>and fifty</n>
16: כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>that</n> הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <sup>6485 </sup> <n>All that were numbered</n> לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>in the camp</n> רְאוּבֵ֗ן <sup>7205 </sup> <n>of Reuben</n> מְאַ֨ת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>[were] an hundred</n> אֶ֜לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְאֶחָ֨ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and one</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>and fifty</n> אֶ֛לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְאַרְבַּע־ <sup>702 </sup> <n>and four</n> מֵא֥וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>and fifty</n> לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>throughout their armies</n> וּשְׁנִיִּ֖ם <sup>8145 </sup> <n>in the second rank</n> יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>And they shall set forth</n> ס
17: וְנָסַ֧ע <sup>5265 </sup> <n>shall set forward</n> אֹֽהֶל־ <sup>168 </sup> <n>Then the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֛ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>with the camp</n> הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>of the Levites</n> בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֑ת <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the camp</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>as they</n> יַחֲנוּ֙ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>as they encamp</n> כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יִסָּ֔עוּ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>so shall they set forward</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> יָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his place</n> לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1714 </sup> <n>by their standards</n> ס
18: דֶּ֣גֶל <sup>1714 </sup> <n>[shall be] the standard</n> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the camp</n> אֶפְרַ֛יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>according to their armies</n> יָ֑מָּה <sup>3220 </sup> <n>On the west side</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <sup>476 </sup> <n>[shall be] Elishama</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <sup>5989 </sup> <n>of Ammihud</n>

21: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> שְׁנַ֧יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and two</n> וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>of them [were] thirty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>and two hundred</n>
22: וּמַטֵּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>Then the tribe</n> בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> בִנְיָמִ֔ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n> אֲבִידָ֖ן <sup>27 </sup> <n>[shall be] Abidan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <sup>1441 </sup> <n>of Gideoni</n>

26: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> שְׁנַ֧יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and two</n> וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <sup>8346 </sup> <n>of them [were] threescore</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וּשְׁבַ֥ע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>and seven</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n>
27: וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <sup>2583 </sup> <n>And those that encamp</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>next</n> מַטֵּ֣ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>by him [shall be] the tribe</n> אָשֵׁ֑ר <sup>836 </sup> <n>of Asher</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> אָשֵׁ֔ר <sup>836 </sup> <n>of Asher</n> פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <sup>6295 </sup> <n>[shall be] Pagiel</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> עָכְרָֽן׃ <sup>5918 </sup> <n>of Ocran</n>
28: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> אֶחָ֧ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and one</n> וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>of them [were] forty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>and five</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n>
29: וּמַטֵּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>Then the tribe</n> נַפְתָּלִ֑י <sup>5321 </sup> <n>of Naphtali</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the captain</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> נַפְתָּלִ֔י <sup>5321 </sup> <n>of Naphtali</n> אֲחִירַ֖ע <sup>299 </sup> <n>[shall be] Ahira</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> עֵינָֽן׃ <sup>5881 </sup> <n>of Enan</n>
30: וּצְבָא֖וֹ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And his host</n> וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and those that were numbered</n> שְׁלֹשָׁ֧ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>and three</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>of them [were] fifty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>and four</n> מֵאֽוֹת׃ <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n>
31: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>that</n> הַפְּקֻדִים֙ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>All they that were numbered</n> לְמַ֣חֲנֵה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>in the camp</n> דָ֔ן <sup>1835 </sup> <n>of Dan</n> מְאַ֣ת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>[were] an hundred</n> אֶ֗לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְשִׁבְעָ֧ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>and seven</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>and fifty</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>and six</n> מֵא֑וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> לָאַחֲרֹנָ֥ה <sup>314 </sup> <n>hindmost</n> יִסְע֖וּ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>They shall go</n> לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1714 </sup> <n>with their standards</n> פ
32: אֵ֛לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> פְּקוּדֵ֥י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>These [are] those which were numbered</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>by the house</n> אֲבֹתָ֑ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>that</n> פְּקוּדֵ֤י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>all those that were numbered</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֹת֙ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the camps</n> לְצִבְאֹתָ֔ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>throughout their hosts</n> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>[were] six</n> מֵא֥וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אֶ֙לֶף֙ <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>and three</n> אֲלָפִ֔ים <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>and five</n> מֵא֖וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <sup>2572 </sup> <n>and fifty</n>
33: וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>But the Levites</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were not</n> הָתְפָּקְד֔וּ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>were not numbered</n> בְּת֖וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוָּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>Moses</n>
34: וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כְּ֠כֹל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוָּ֨ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>according to all that the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֹשֶׁ֗ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>Moses</n> כֵּֽן־ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> חָנ֤וּ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>so they pitched</n> לְדִגְלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>1714 </sup> <n>by their standards</n> וְכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>and so</n> נָסָ֔עוּ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>and so they set forward</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖יו <sup>4940 </sup> <n>after their families</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>according</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>according to the house</n> אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n>
